definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou

sentences.english: The double-decked western - style design, the fine decoration, in the room has the independence the sauna room…
sentences.chinese: 双层欧式设计，精致的装修，房间内有独立的桑拿室。

sentences.english: Economic envy, once seen as a European vice, is now rife.
sentences.chinese: 曾经被看做欧式恶习的经济嫉妒，如今却很盛行。

sentences.english: Set off by two gardens, the three European style building look elegant and magnificent.
sentences.chinese: 三幢欧式建筑在两座花园的衬托下尽显高贵典雅之气。

sentences.english: Shanghai has its European eccentricity, but little prepares you for the Gothic towers.
sentences.chinese: 上海有欧式的嗜好，却没有哥特式建筑的沉重。

sentences.english: Heihei, This is the picture of the library with the style of European building.
sentences.chinese: 嘿嘿，这是太原科技大学具有欧式建筑风格的图书馆。

sentences.english: A short period of ten years, the colonists built in Qingdao, a large number of European-style architecture.
sentences.chinese: 短短十几年间，殖民者在青岛建造了大量欧式建筑。

sentences.english: It is also Macao's only pseudo-European theater.
sentences.chinese: 也是澳门惟一一家仿欧式的剧院。

sentences.english: Gates and ancillary buildings of the enterprises must be the European or Chinese Modern Style.
sentences.chinese: 大门及附属建筑为欧式或中式现代风格。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, China is a country with ancient civilization and a land of courtesy.
sentences.chinese: 同时，中国欧式文明古国，礼仪之邦。

sentences.english: There are many wooden houses in European style in this town.
sentences.chinese: 在这座小城里有许多欧式木造房屋。

sentences.english: Perform the arch with European style and structure.
sentences.chinese: 体现建筑欧式风格构造线条。

sentences.english: and for guys, Ben Sherman is good, kind of more European.
sentences.chinese: 有适合男生的宾舍曼牌子，欧式风格的。

sentences.english: Wood windows and doors makes you building classicality and ethereally with European wood windows and doors.
sentences.chinese: 欧式木质门窗使您的房屋具有古典幽雅的气质。
周围贴的瓷砖也是欧式的。

sentences.english: The menu includes a varied range of Pan-Asian and Continental dishes.
sentences.chinese: 菜单里包含了不同范围的泛亚洲和欧式菜肴。
那些老建筑都是欧式风格。

definition: to pass an exam (or the imperial exam)/to qualify

to return to old ways (a Confucian aspiration)/to turn back the clock/neoclassical school during Tang and Song associated with classical writing 古文/retro (fashion style based on nostalgia, esp. for 1960s)
interesting and appealing (of old locations, objects etc)
harmonious combination of Chinese and Western elements (idiom)
